==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ふ|どう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From [[不]] ([[フ]], ''[[fu]]'') meaning "[[not]]" + [[同]] ([[ドウ]], ''[[dō]]''), from [[同じ]] ([[おなじ]], ''[[onaji]]'') meaning "[[same]]".

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ふどう}}

# [[difference]], [[irregularity]], [[inequality]]
# [[diversity]]

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|順序不同|じゅんじょ ふどう}}: not sorted
* {{ja-r|順不同|じゅんふどう}}: not sorted
